description: Clé primaire. Code d'utilisation de brevet de l'FDA Orange Book

sample_rows.définition: TREATMENT OF CF IN PATIENTS 6 YEARS AND OLDER WHO HAVE A F508DEL OR G551D CFTR MUTATION AND A 2ND MUTATION SELECTED FROM R117H, A455E, 2789+5G->A, AND 3849+10KBC->T, COMPRISING CONCURRENT COADMINISTRATION OF THE COMPOSITIONS OF CLAIM 1 OF US 10058546
